title: "omg i don't get why anyone would have a console over PC #pcmasterrace"
body:
Not everyone likes sitting in the corner of the room on a computer, not everyone likes to mod out their games, some people like playing with friends when they come over, not everyone wants to shell out 1.5k$+ for the amazing set up you have when they can get a 50" TV and a PS4 for like 65% of that.


I love my pc and really like playing some games on it, but I am a console player first pc 2nd
